LanguageData.Yokai_SpinMouse.label: SpinMouse
LanguageData.Yokai_SpinMouse.description: This friendly spirit appears to be a subspecies of hedgehog. Large spikes protect an otherwise weak creature; however, its high fertility rate seems to overcome this disadvantage. With a bit of skill-and caution-you too can make this age old favorite your pet.
LanguageData.Yokai_SpinMouse.tools.0.label: FrontLeftPaw
LanguageData.Yokai_SpinMouse.tools.1.label: FrontRightPaw
LanguageData.Yokai_SpinMouse.tools.2.label: Teeth
LanguageData.Yokai_SpinMouse_Leather.label: SpinMouse leather
LanguageData.Yokai_SpinMouse_Corpse.label: SpinMouse corpse
